Sentence.sentence: I remember talking with a young lawyer who was about to begin her first jury trial.

Sentence.sentence: And it is clearly up to the current generation of leaders from high-emitting nations to decide whether they  want to be remembered as climate change tyrants or pioneers.

Sentence.sentence: In many countries immigrants have been filling such gaps in the labour force as have already emerged (and remember that the real shortage is still around ten years off).

Sentence.sentence: As I was growing up, I remember being carefully taught that independence not interdependence was everything.

Sentence.sentence: Even people with the sharpest facial-recognition skills can only remember so much.

Sentence.sentence: I remember in Japan, people heading directly to the fruit section in the supermarket, when the banana diet was at its peak.

Sentence.sentence: It literally is like something in a dream to remember what it's like to actually be able to go out and put in a day's work and receive a day's pay.

Sentence.sentence: It suggests the children remember the researcher they've met just one time when they were only one-year-olds.

Sentence.sentence: Looking back now, nine years later, I can't remember exactly what it was about these universities that made them seem so much better.

Sentence.sentence: Now that you mention there's a sale going on,I do remember a dress I quite like when I was in the shop on Sunday.

Sentence.sentence: Remember how you feel when you are speeding down the highway and a big truck suddenly brakes twenty meters in front of you.

Sentence.sentence: Start from there, but remember to stick to the parameters of the assignment.

Sentence.sentence: You probably remember that human infants are less developed physically than other mammals of the same age.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"记忆，记住，回忆"之意。
means: memorize ： 指有意识的下功夫把某事的整个细节都记在脑子里。
remember ： 含义较广，多指无意识地回忆起往事，也可指通过主观努力去记忆。
recall比remember文雅，指想方设法回忆已经遗忘之事。
recollect ： 指在记忆中搜索，设法想起一时想不起的事情或人，强调过程。
remind ： 指经某人或某事的提醒而回忆起某件已遗忘之事。

stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+memor记忆+able……的→大家该一起记住→值得纪念的
im不+memor记忆+ial……的→不能记得的→远古的
memor记忆+andum东西→帮助记的东西→备忘录

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
stems_affixes.word_buile: memor记忆+y状态,性质→n.记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
re再+membr=memor记忆+ance表名词→n.记得,记忆
com共同+memor记住+ate表动词→大家一起记住→纪念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记住;[to]转达问候,代……致意,代……问好
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+member=memor记忆→再记得→回忆,记忆

Sentence.sentence: Hard times may hold you down at what usually seems  like the most inopportune time, but you should remember that they won't last forever.

Sentence.sentence: millennials remember their father and mother both were laid off.

Sentence.sentence: Next time somebody pushes corporate quotas as a way to promote gender equity, remember that such policies are largely self-serving measures that make their sponsors feel good but do little to help average women.

Sentence.sentence: No matter how isolated you might feel and how serious the situation is, you should always remember that you are not alone.

Sentence.sentence: Pretty in pink: adult women do not remember being so obsessed with the colour, yet it is pervasive in our young girls' lives.

Sentence.sentence: Remember in dealing with any coworker what they appreciate from an interaction.

Sentence.sentence: So remember the little details of the people you met or you talked with; perhaps the places they have been to the place they want to go, the things they like, the thing the hate—whatever you talk about.

Sentence.sentence: Value the present moment and remember how fortunate you are to be alive.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: We suddenly can't remember where we put the keys just a moment ago, or an old acquaintance's name, or the name of an old band we used to love.

Sentence.sentence: When you remember such thing you can automatically become investor in their wellbeing.

sentences.en: She was from Henan, if I remember correctly.
sentences.cn: 她是河南人, 如果我没记错的话。

sentences.en: I have never had this kind of experience since I can remember.
sentences.cn: 自我记事以来, 我从来没有这样的经历。

sentences.en: I don't remember him.
sentences.cn: 我记不起他了。

sentences.en: I will always remember your kindness to me.
sentences.cn: 我将永远记住你对我的好意。

sentences.en: Then he remembered a poem that he had learned when he was a child.
sentences.cn: 这时他记起小时候学过的一首诗。

sentences.en: Please remember to give her the book.
sentences.cn: 请记着把这本书给她。

sentences.en: Please remember to give me a phone call when you get there.
sentences.cn: 请记住你到那儿时给我来个电话。

sentences.en: Remember to mail the letter for me.
sentences.cn: 记住帮我把信寄出。

sentences.en: Remember to post the letter for me.
sentences.cn: 别忘了替我把信寄出。

sentences.en: Remember to use postal code.
sentences.cn: 勿忘使用邮政编码。

sentences.en: Do you remember getting some medicine for her last week?
sentences.cn: 你还记得上星期给她买药的事吗?

sentences.en: I remember having asked her to come.
sentences.cn: 我记得曾经要她来。

sentences.en: I remember having seen someone take it away.
sentences.cn: 我记得曾看见有人把它拿走。

sentences.en: I remember having heard you speak on that subject.
sentences.cn: 我记得曾听你谈论过那个题目。

sentences.en: I never remember having come across a man like that.
sentences.cn: 我怎么也记不起碰到过这样一个人。

sentences.en: I remember that I wrote to him.
sentences.cn: 我记得给他写过信了。

sentences.en: She remembers that he visited her but she can't remember when.
sentences.cn: 她记得他曾来看过她, 但记不清是什么时候了。

sentences.en: Can you remember where he lives?
sentences.cn: 你记得他住在哪里吗?

sentences.en: He could not remember where he had seen her before.
sentences.cn: 他记不起在什么地方见过她了。

sentences.en: She always remembers me at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 每逢圣诞节她总给我送礼品。

means.word_mean: 记着，不忘（去做）；动手做（必须做的事）

data.mean: 记着，不忘（去做）；动手做（必须做的事）

sentence.cn: 我记得我很早就喜欢画画，所以从那时起，我就知道自己将成为一名艺术家。
sentence.en: I always liked drawing as early as I can remember,  so right from then,  I knew what I was going to be an artist.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语四川卷 听力 原文

sentence.cn: 我不记得商店的名字，但是你会找到它的。
sentence.en: I can't remember the name of the shop,  but you'll find it.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 听力 原文

entry.def: If you remember people or events from the past, you still have an idea of them in your mind and you are able to think about them.

example.ex: You wouldn't remember me. I was in another group...
example.tran: 你不会记得我。我那时在另外一组。

example.ex: I certainly don't remember talking to you at all...
example.tran: 我当然完全不记得和你讲过话。

entry.def: If you remember that something is the case, you become aware of it again after a time when you did not think about it.
entry.tran: (经过一段时间后)忆起，回忆起

example.ex: She remembered that she was going to the social club that evening...
example.tran: 她记起来那晚她正要去社交俱乐部。

example.ex: Then I remembered the cheque, which cheered me up.
example.tran: 然后我想起了那张支票，这让我精神大振。

entry.def: If you cannot remember something, you are not able to bring it back into your mind when you make an effort to do so.

example.ex: If you can't remember your number, write it in code in a diary...
example.tran: 如果你记不住你的号码，用代码把它记在记事本上。

example.ex: I couldn't remember ever having felt so safe and secure...
example.tran: 我从未有过如此安全的感觉。

entry.def: If you remember to do something, you do it when you intend to.

example.ex: I did remember to take the present...
Please remember to enclose a stamped addressed envelope when writing.
example.tran: 请记得写信时在信封里放一个贴好邮票、写明地址的信封。

entry.def: You tell someone to remember that something is the case when you want to emphasize its importance. It may be something that they already know about or a new piece of information.

example.ex: It is important to remember that each person reacts differently...
example.tran: 重要的是要记住每个人的反应不同。

example.ex: It is worth remembering that children tend to copy their parents in this respect...
example.tran: 值得记住的是孩子们在这一方面往往会效仿父母。

entry.def: If you say that someone will be remembered for something that they have done, you mean that people will think of this whenever they think about the person.

example.ex: At his grammar school he is remembered for being bad at games...
example.tran: 在文法学校他因不善于玩游戏为大家所熟知。

example.ex: He will always be remembered as one of the great Chancellors of the Exchequer.
example.tran: 作为最伟大的财政大臣之一他将永远被铭记。

entry.def: If you ask someone to remember you to a person who you have not seen for a long time, you are asking them to pass your greetings on to that person.

example.ex: 'Remember me to Lyle, won't you?' I said...
She asked to be remembered to you.
example.tran: 她要我转达对你的问候。

entry.def: If you make a celebration an occasion to remember, you make it very enjoyable for all the people involved.

example.ex: We'll give everyone a night to remember...
example.tran: 我们将带给大家一个难忘的夜晚。

example.ex: I'll make it a birthday to remember.
example.tran: 我将使这成为一个难忘的生日。

means.word_mean: 1. recall knowledge from memory; have a recollection;

sentences.sentence: "I can't remember saying any such thing"
"I can't think what her last name was"
"Do you remember that he once loved you?"

means.word_mean: 2. keep in mind for attention or consideration;

sentences.sentence: "Remember to call your mother every day!"
"Think of the starving children in India!"

means.word_mean: 3. recapture the past; indulge in memories;

sentences.sentence: "he remembered how he used to pick flowers"

means.word_mean: 6. mention as by way of greeting or to indicate friendship;
7. exercise, or have the power of, memory;

sentences.sentence: "After the shelling, many people lost the ability to remember"

means.word_mean: 8. call to remembrance; keep alive the memory of someone or something, as in a ceremony;

sentences.sentence: "We remembered the 50th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz"
"Remember the dead of the First World War"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French remembrer, from late Latin rememorari 'call to mind', from re- (expressing intensive force) + Latin memor 'mindful'

sentences.cn: 这位是卡拉。你记得她吗？
sentences.en: This is Carla. Do you remember her?

sentences.cn: 我已经忘了第一天上学的情景。
sentences.en: I don't remember my first day at school.

sentences.cn: 他记忆中的她依然是他多年以前认识的那个活泼的少女。
sentences.en: He still remembered her as the lively teenager he'd known years before.

sentences.cn: 我记得这是我们第三次会面了。
sentences.en: As far as I can remember , this is the third time we've met.

sentences.cn: 你记得我们出来之前关灯了吗？
sentences.en: Do you remember switching the lights off before we came out?

sentences.cn: 我隐约记得听到他进来。
sentences.en: I vaguely remember hearing him come in.

sentences.cn: 爷爷教我打纸牌的情景我记忆犹新。
sentences.en: I can still vividly remember my grandfather teaching me to play cards.

sentences.cn: 我记得我们过去经常在周末去看望他们。
sentences.en: I remember (that) we used to go and see them most weekends.

sentences.cn: 我不记得他请过哪怕一天假。
sentences.en: (formal)I can't remember his taking a single day off work.

sentences.cn: 对不起——我想不起你的名字了。
sentences.en: I'm sorry─I can't remember your name.

sentences.cn: 你能回忆起我们花了多少钱吗？

sentences.cn: 你说要帮着我做的。记得吗？
sentences.en: You were going to help me with this. Remember?

sentences.cn: 别忘了我们今天晚上要出去。
sentences.en: Remember that we're going out tonight.

sentences.cn: 不要忘记大多数事故都是在家里发生的。
sentences.en: It should be remembered that the majority of accidents happen in the home.

sentences.cn: 你不会记得我。我那时在另外一组。
sentences.en: You wouldn't remember me. I was in another group...

sentences.cn: 我当然完全不记得和你讲过话。
sentences.en: I certainly don't remember talking to you at all...

sentences.cn: 她记起来那晚她正要去社交俱乐部。

sentences.cn: 然后我想起了那张支票，这让我精神大振。

sentences.cn: 例如，忘记一部特别喜欢的电影中的某个演员的名字，根本不必担心。但是如果你忘记了这部电影的情节，或者甚至不记得看过这部电影，这种情况则让人担忧得多，达夫勒说道。
sentences.en: Forgetting the name of an actor in a favorite movie, for example, isnothing to worry about. But if you forget the plot of the movie or don't remember even seeing it, that's far more concerning, Daffner says.

sentences.en: O Lord God away the face of thine anointed: remember the mercies of David thy servant.

sentences.cn: 他将永远被当做一名英雄人物来纪念.
sentences.en: He will always be remembered as an honorable figure.

sentences.cn: 无论老少,都聚集在一起,纪念这个传统的节庆日.
sentences.en: The young and old come together to remember the traditional times.

sentences.cn: 每支钢笔都能起到纪念品的作用, 或者可以帮助人们记住一个事件.
sentences.en: Each pen serves as a memento, or something that helps someone remember an event.

sentences.cn: 还记得雷锋 吗 ?今天是学习雷锋同志纪念日.
sentences.en: Bob : Do you remember Leifeng? Today is the memorial day of learning Leifeng.

sentences.cn: 特德?威廉姆斯最值得纪念的就是1941年创造了单赛季406次命中的成绩.
sentences.en: Ted Williams is best remembered for his season batting average of 406 in 1941.

sentences.cn: 姿势影响记忆: 记不住结婚纪念日 吗 ?
sentences.en: Body position affects your memory: Can't remember your anniversary?

sentences.cn: 所以各种纪念日跟生日, 你必需全部都记得.
sentences.en: All the anniversaries and birthdays, you must remember in heart.

sentences.cn: “回想起出门工作一天然后拿到一天的薪水的情景，感觉真的像是在梦里。
sentences.en: “It literally is like something in a dream to remember what it’s like to actually be able to go out and put in a day’s work and receive a day’s pay.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 这个黑人妇女回想起找这个工作费了多少事.
sentences.en: The Black woman remembered what had cost her to get that job.

sentences.cn: 如果你当时没有注意,后来就不可能回想起来.
sentences.en: It is not possible to remember things later if you didn't attention in the first place.

sentences.cn: 他开始迷惑不解, 接着他紧握双手尽力地回想起来.
sentences.en: He looked puzzled at first, then smote his hands together as he remembered.

sentences.cn: 回想起我的童年时代, 我能记得许多有趣的事情.
sentences.en: Looking back on my childhood, I can remember a lot of interesting things.

sentences.cn: 约翰·亨利不时地回想起几年前做过的那个奇异的梦.
sentences.en: Every now and then, John Henry would remember the strange dream he had had years before.

sentences.cn: 当弗兰克回想起他早年的艰苦岁月和成功的漫长道路时,他微笑了.
sentences.en: Frank smiled when he remembered his hard early years and the long road to success.

sentences.cn: 每当回想起来就会感到全身乏力,灵魂出窍似的.
sentences.en: As we remember it we lose the element of activity ; we look at ourselves from outside.

sentences.cn: 他心绪不安地回想起她那特别光润的皮肤和晶莹迷人的眼睛.
sentences.en: He remembered uneasily the awful glow of her skin and the distracting clarity of her eyes.

sentences.cn: 然而, 现在回想起来, 那些日子我差不多都忘记了.
sentences.en: Nonetheless, looking back now, I don't remember much of that day.

sentences.cn: 向班机走去时, 我回想起另一次离别和重逢.
sentences.en: As I head toward the plane, I find myself remembering yet another arrival and departure.

sentences.cn: 我记得了, 现在一切都回想起来了.
sentences.en: I remember, it all comes back to me now.

sentences.cn: 她回想起他那宽阔的褐色胸膛和强壮的臂膀曾给过她多少安慰.
sentences.en: She remembered the comfort of his broad brown chest and his strong arms.

sentences.cn: 每每一回想起丈夫,她便开始啜泣.
sentences.en: She often started to cry remembering her husband.

sentences.cn: 没有人可以清楚回想起他们伟大的成就或者罪恶的事迹.
sentences.en: Nobody can remember clearly their great achievements nor their sinful deeds.

sentences.cn: 你可以节省很多时间来试图回想起你头脑里面闪光的成千上万的想法.
sentences.en: You'll save time trying to remember the brilliant idea that slipped your mind.

sentences.cn: 我能清楚地回想起我女儿来医院看我和她刚出生的弟弟的那一刻。
sentences.en: I can remember the precise moment when my daughter came to see me and her new baby brother in hospital.
